citation: Proclamation under the Relationships Amendment (Recognition of Registered Relationships) Act 2010 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Relationships Amendment (Recognition of Registered Relationships) Act 2010

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Relationships Amendment (Recognition of Registered Relationships) Act 2010 fix 1 April 2011 as the day on which that Act commences.

28 March 2011

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

DAVID BARTLETT

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 March 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
